trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_SEQ_00<tab>Qhoterl Pasol would set history right once and for all.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested supplies to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine slabs of splendid black rock at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the slabs of splendid black rock to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather tufts of splendid hemp at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the tufts of splendid hemp to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Spearfish a splendid mammoth shellfish in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid mammoth shellfish to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Thanks to your tireless efforts, our excavation is nearing its completion. The gifts of the past we've uncovered here will be a boon to future Qitari, to be sure, but we mustn't keep our discoveries to ourselves. No, I intend to spread knowledge of Ronka to every corner of the world!

TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>To that end, I mean to author a definitive history of Ronka with my own hands. Moreover, I intend to use an ingenious system of woodblocks and ink to produce enough copies so that no curious mind goes unsated.

TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_002<tab>If you would be an ally of history, then I have just the task for you. Pray bring me a slab of black stone from Mjrl's Regret. While it may appear a common stone at first glance, we have long used it to make writing instruments.

TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_003<tab>If you would be an ally of history, then I have just the task for you. Pray bring me hemp from Mjrl's Regret. I can't start writing without paper, and the material made from this hemp is as sturdy as it comes.

TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_004<tab>If you would be an ally of history, then I have just the task for you. Pray return with a mammoth shellfish from the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. Though they may be tricky to snag with your spear, their sacs contain enough ink to fill countless inkwells.
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_005<tab>The world is eager to learn the truth of Ronka. Return here with the black stone and I shall begin writing at once!
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_006<tab>The world is eager to learn the truth of Ronka. Return here with the hemp and I shall begin writing at once!
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_007<tab>The world is eager to learn the truth of Ronka. Return here with the shellfish and I shall begin writing at once!
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>I am always glad to see you, and now more than ever! Have you brought the materials I requested?

TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_011<tab>Splendid, as always! I eventually hope to distribute my chronicle throughout Norvrandt, although it would be prudent to begin with a smaller proving ground, such as the Greatwood. Assuming I meet with success here, my ambitions know no bounds!
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_012<tab>A Steward can ask for no greater honor than this task I've given myself, and I shan't rest until I see it done!
